branchCategory.name: C(D)Q2KW-Z, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting, Double Rod, Non-rotating
branchCategory.description: Standard double acting, non-rotating double rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 12mm to 63mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

breadCrumb.name: C(D)Q2KW-Z,Dbl Rod Non-rotating w/Auto Sw Mounting Groove
